TITLE: Credit Card Authorization Form
TEXT: In order to protect our customers from unauthorized usage of their credit cards, if you would like us to bill charges to a credit card not physically presented to us at check in, please fill out the following and fax this form back (614) 416-8444. This form must be filled out in its entirety in order for us to bill a credit card not physically presented.
FORM: 1 ALL CHARGES OR 1 Room & Tax ONLY 1 Movies 1 Banquet/ Meeting Room 1 Phone 1 Valet Laundry 1 Catering 1 Meals 1 Bar / Lounge 1 Fax / Copy 1 Valet Parking 1 Other (Specify)
UNSPECIFIED: Name of guest Elene Emard I authorize the following charges to be billed. 1 American Express 1 Discover Card 1 Visa 1 Mastercard 1 Diners Club 1 Carte Blanche CARD NUMBER 371289649801040 EXPIRATION DATE 03/23 (THIS IS THE NAME PRINTED ON THE CARD) CONTACT PHONE NUMBER 603 253 3115 x389
